analysis: The project appears to be a static website focused on black holes, with a theme that includes cosmic visuals and animations. The current files include HTML, CSS, and JavaScript for the main content, as well as additional files for GitHub Pages and documentation. The CSS file is incomplete and needs to be updated with a dark, cosmic theme, including animations for black hole visuals, swirling effects, and glowing elements. The HTML file needs to be completed with a mobile-friendly navigation menu and interactive elements related to black holes. The JavaScript file has syntax errors and needs to be fixed and completed to ensure all functions are properly implemented.

improvements.description: Complete the CSS file with the full intended dark, cosmic theme including animations for black hole visuals, swirling effects, and glowing elements.
Add a mobile-friendly navigation menu with a hamburger icon for better usability on mobile devices.
Fix the syntax errors in the showSlide function and complete the JavaScript content to ensure all functions are properly implemented.
